attributes.action: allow the cross breeding of a shetland pony and a sea monkey to see what the outcome would be and therefore creat new rural method of transporting and exporting goods via land and sea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It will allow for a relativly simple experiment to be carried out for the genetic research into the cross breeding of shetland ponies and that of the sea monkey (commonly found in toys 'r' us). This research will hopefully lead to a new species being created that will be nimble on both land and sea, possibly making the import/export and transportation of good much more ecomimically and environmentally friendly throughout the world.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
